history.proof: intros. qsimpl use: remove,in_in_remove. qsimpl use: remove,Permutation_cons_append,in_in_remove. hauto use: Add_inv, Permutation_Add.

exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type x : X l : list X H : In x l The term "X" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "forall x0 y : ?A0, {x0 = y} + {x0 <> y}".

In environment l0 : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x = y -> False}) -> A -> list A -> list A H0 : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x = y -> False}) (l : list A) (x y : A), (x = y -> False) -> In x l -> In x (l0 A eq_dec y l) X : Type x : X l : list X H : In x l Unable to unify "?M1725 :: ?M1724 ~p ?M1724 ++ ?M1725 :: nil" with "exists m : list X, x :: m ~p l".

original: intros X x l H. exists (remove (in_in_remove X) x l). apply Permutation_cons_append.
